name: Cernunnos
description:
A student-made game project for Studio 694, WCG's in-house game development team. Created by Josh Taylor. Josh's portfolio can be found here.  

You are tasked with exploring an unreleased game from the 1990s in hopes of finding out what really happened to your sister. Cernunnos is an abstract, experimental game with lots to discover and some hidden features for those determined enough to find them.

Controls:

Use numbers 1-10 to change weapons

WASD to move and Space to jump

Shift to sprint

Click mouse to attack

Press E to interact.

Follow us at @WCGamesArt

All Studio 694's games are made by students as part of their coursework. We do our best but please expect bugs / glitches / other unexpected strangeness.
